statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ -6 \\ -4 \\ 12 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 8 \\ -5 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
